name: platformer (Leandro Araújo)
description:
My second game 🙋

A simple platformer . Try to run from the water and avoid the spikes. Keep jumping and go the higher that you can.

How to play

Left - left arrow key

Right - right arrow key

Jump - spacebar

Made with https://godotengine.org/

Assets: 1-Bit Platformer Pack by Kenney

Palette: Japanese Woodblock by Polyducks
